title: The Lonely villa
brief_description: A mother and her children are held hostage by a gang of thieves in their home and it is a race against time for the father to get home and save them. Cast includes David Miles, Marion Leonard, Mary Pickford, Gladys Egan, Adele DeGarde, Mack Sennett. Silent film with no intertitles.
